thread.title: Michelle Obama Gives John Lewis a Little Support on Twitter
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Gives John Lewis a Little Support on Twitter

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Michelle Obama Gives John Lewis a Little Support on Twitter
text:
Michelle Obama Gives John Lewis a Little Support on Twitter by Lindsey Ellefson | 5:38   
In her final days as First Lady, Michelle Obama is using her Twitter account to weigh in on a very timely topic. Well, two timely topics, depending on how you look at it. 
Today is Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, so to honor him, she tweeted this: Thinking of Dr. King and great leaders like @repjohnlewis who carry on his legacy. May their example be our call to action. -mo 
— The First Lady (@FLOTUS) January 16, 2017 
See that shoutout to John Lewis , though? That’s not just a quick nod to another Civil Rights hero. 
The representative from Georgia was disparaged by President-elect Donald Trump after he said that Trump can’t be a legitimate president if Russia interfered with the election. He claimed that Lewis is “all talk” and no action, which Georgians and Amazon customers , among many others, immediately contested. 
FLOTUS, too, it seems, stands with the representative, who has been fighting for civil rights for decades.
